  • public class HierarchyPanelController
extends com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.kit.editor.panel.hierarchy.treeview.HierarchyTreeViewController
    Concrete class to create and control the Hierarchy Panel of Scene Builder Kit. Update this class inheritance in order to use either a TreeView or a TreeTableView in hierarchy. p
